Windlord:

"Come on... can you understand us?"said Windlord"We won't hurt you, 
who're you? and how did you came in here?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> The Caveman let out some more grunts. He could understand them, 
though he 
> didn't know how. He made some gestures and grunted some more. He 
pointed to his 
> hammer and laid it on the ground, then picked it up again.
